content.title: Uses
content.description: Medium sized free produces edible fruit. Fruit is rich in vitamins A, C, iron, phosphorus and calcium and minerals. Metabolites found include: phenolic, flavonoid, carotenoid, terpenoid and triterpene. Plant has antispasmodic and antimicrobial properties in the treatment of diarrhoea and dysentery. Also used extensively as a hypoglycaemic agent. It has antioxidant, hepatoprotection, anti-allergy, antimicrobial, antigenotoxic, antiplasmodial,cytotoxic, antispasmodic, cardioactive, anticough, antidiabetic, antiinflamatory and antinociceptive activities. The phenolic compounds assist to cure cancerous cells and prevent skin aging before time.
